summary: Cocoapod for Project Rome iOS SDK.
description:
The Project Rome SDK contains the iOS client library for the Project Rome SDK offering
Device Relay, User Activities, and Graph Notifications technologies.  

- Learn more about Project Rome: http://aka.ms/projectrome
- Documentation & API Reference: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/project-rome/
- iOS Samples: https://github.com/Microsoft/project-rome/

Requirements:
- iOS must be version 10.0 or higher.
